Billings.Skyview High School (Montana): Skyview High School is a four-year comprehensive public high school in Billings, Montana. The school serves 1,600 students with 93 certified staff, 36 support staff and 10 custodians under principal Deb Black, associate principal Danette Cerise, and Deans Scott Lynch and Jay Wahl. Skyview sits on 46 acres (190,000 m2) and is 258,000 square feet (24,000 m2) in size.
